body:
So the remaining one is here:

https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/34c4ffd7c454848311f71e6869b5cad4bc132449/pandas/_libs/src/ujson/python/objToJSON.c#L1832-L1840

I am also not that familiar with python's c api, but can be get here the total_seonds attribute here from `obj` (obj is a timedelta, note sure what the 'value' attribute is) (@jreback ?)
